articles.description: Virginia, after a surprise second-place finish in 2020, was the preseason choice to the ACC men's basketball title on Wednesday. It was the first time since 1982-83 that the Wahoos were the preseason choice and only second time in the 52-year history of the l…
articles.content:
By Joe Giglio, WRALSportsFan
Virginia was supposed to be in rebuilding mode after winning the NCAA tournament in 2019 and losing their top three players to the NBA draft.

articles.title: Dalvin Cook takes second straight NFC offensive player of the week - NBC Sports - NFL
articles.description: The Vikings season hasn’t played out as hoped in the standings, but running back Dalvin Cook isn’t the man to blame for that. Cook has scored at least one touchdown in every game he’s played this season and he added two more in last Sunday’s 34-20 win over th…
